# Glossary

| English                    | Tagalog       | Col3 |
|----------------------------|---------------|------|
| boots (rubber)             | b**o**tas     |      |
| farmer                     | magsasak**a** |      |
| flower                     | bulakl**a**k  |      |
| gardener                   | hardin**e**ro |      |
| grass                      | dam**o**      |      |
| hat                        | sumbr**e**ro  |      |
| landowner/plantation owner | asind**e**ro  |      |
| mountain                   | bund**o**k    |      |
| seashore (coast, beach)    | tabing-dagat  |      |
| sky                        | l**a**ngit    |      |
| tree                       | p**u**no      |      |
